title: The Wizard of Waterdeep
content:
tems as you continue your journey:

Idol of Silvanus: Located in Druid Grove. You have to steal it before the Tieflings Depart the grove. It is a part of Steal the Sacred Idol quest. Amulet of Selune: Located in the interior of the goblin camp at Shattered Sanctum, walk up the stairs behind the throne of the leader, unlock the gate and it is in one of the chests. Iron Flask: The Risen Road, Zhentarin locked chest. (Note: This item is required intact for Find the Missing Shipment) Sword of Justic
